title: Competitive:Disruptor
paragraphs: When the Disruptor is thrown, it explodes on contact with surfaces and players. It lasts for 5 seconds, and the effected Inkling's * abilities are changed in the following ways:
- Running speed is decreased by about 45%.
- Swimming speed is decreased by about 65%.
- Upon submersion, the affected Inkling will glow, revealing their position.
